mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != '' AND m.status = 0 AND m.deleted = 0
SELECT r.* FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = 0 AND r.deleted = 0 ORDER BY r.sort
